title: Playlist & Channel Support
description: Support for downloading entire playlists and channel content. Batch operations, playlist parsing, channel video enumeration.

title: Subtitles Support
description: Subtitle/caption extraction and embedding. Download captions in various formats, embed into video files.

title: YouTube Core Library
description: Core library for YouTube interaction: video info extraction, stream URL parsing, format detection. Similar to YoutubeExplode in the original project.

title: CLI Foundation
description: CLI foundation using cobra framework: root command, download command, info command, version command. Standard Go project layout with cmd/ and internal/ directories.

title: Metadata Embedding
description: Extract and embed media metadata: title, author, thumbnail, description into downloaded files.

title: Download Engine
description: Download functionality: stream downloading, progress tracking, format/quality selection, file naming, resume support.

title: Search Functionality
description: Search-based video discovery. Allow users to search YouTube and select videos to download without direct URLs.
